message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a little high for me.  Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you think the price is a bit high, but I really want to make a deal with you, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we say $140?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  How about we settle at $110?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $130?
Alice, this is a fair offer and a good deal for both of us. I'm willing to meet you at $115, but that's my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $115. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we say $125?
